div.p: AND FINALLY TONIGHT, THE FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY, I, YOUR HUMBLE
CORRESPONDENT, GO HOLLYWOOD AND I DIDN'T EVEN KNOW IT.
HERE I AM ON THE "HOLLYWOOD REPORTER" THIS MONTH.
THE MOST POWERFUL PEOPLE IN MEDIA.
MY MOM WILL LIKE IT. EVERY TIME I'M IN PRINT,
HOWEVER, MY MOTHER GETS TO GLOAT TO NEIGHBORS WHO ONCE THOUGHT I
WOULD WIND UP IN PRISON. ANYWAY, THE ARTICLE LISTS THE
MANY EGOS INVOLVED HERE. IF YOU WANT TO CHECK IT OUT GO
TO HOLLYWOODREPORTER.COM. I JUST IMAGINE SOME PEOPLE IN
HOLLYWOOD GETTING THEIR SUBSCRIPTION AND THERE I AM ON
